name: International Mire Conservation Group
headAddress: Institute of Botany and Landscape Ecology
goal:
The Society’s objectives are to provide and maintain a network of specialists who:
a. internationally promote, encourage and, where appropriate, co-ordinate the conservation of mires and related systems at all scales; and
b. internationally enhance the exchange of information and experience relating to mires and factors affecting them
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment
